slug.label: Slug
slug.help: You can access the page at www.yoursite.com/<slug>. Please note that slugs have the least priority in URL maps - therefore if it clashes with the name of a category, or any of the following keywords, the page will be ignored. Reserved keywords (at time of last update) - user, search, login, logout, auth, issuearchive, rss, go, redirect, validate

content.label: Content
content.help: Full HTML may be used, and PHP code can be included if encloded in <?php ?> tags. The keyword __CSRF_TOKEN__ will be automatically replaced with the CSRF token for AJAX forms in pages, place in a hidden input element of name 'token'
